content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command from the user to execute a shell command to google online communities or forums for language learning resource recommendations. The command returned a list of communities and forums. The user suggested it would be helpful to join multiple online communities and forums to get a variety of recommendations. The user asked for other suggestions on how to learn different languages, and I suggested language learning apps that offer interactive lessons, quizzes, and games. \n\nAfter that, I received a message from my computer saying that the execute_shell command returned a list of language learning apps that offer interactive lessons, quizzes, and games. The computer asked if I wanted to search for the best language learning apps now.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'I can use Google to research the best language learning apps. I can then analyze the features and reviews of each app to make an informed decision about which app to use. Do you want me to search for the best language learning apps now?\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best language learning apps"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.cnet.com/tech/services-and-software/best-language-learning-apps/", "https://www.cnn.com/cnn-underscored/reviews/best-language-learning-apps", "https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbes-personal-shopper/2021/01/22/best-language-learning-apps/", "https://www.wired.com/gallery/best-language-learning-apps/", "https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.duolingo&hl=en_US&gl=US", "https://www.lingualift.com/blog/best-language-learning-apps/", "https://www.cntraveler.com/story/best-language-learning-apps", "https://www.zdnet.com/article/best-language-learning-app/"]'}]
"""
